message: I have a unique opportunity to sell this product to you today. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Would you like to make a serious offer on it?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you have a budget constraint, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $9000. However, I'm willing to compromise. Would you be open to a price of $11500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be open to a price of $10500?
I see you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $12000?
I understand you're trying to find a middle ground, but I'm not comfortable going above $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
